description.value:
The target has been affected by a rogue's @UUID[Compendium.xprpg.actionsxprpg.Debilitating Strike]{Debilitating Strike} if the rogue also has @UUID[Compendium.xprpg.feats-srd.Enduring Debilitation]{Enduring Debilitation}.

Note: this effect only tracks the duration of the debilitation. You need to manually apply the specific penalties the rogue chose to apply.
